item.title: The Verge’s 2026 Valentine’s Day gift guide (for him)
item.description: Valentine's Day is often thought of as the quintessential Hallmark holiday - and why wouldn't it be? Most of the time, it's marketed to us with massive floral arrangements and heart-shaped chocolates, both of which can come off as borderline twee. But no one says you have to play by the rulebook when it comes […]

item.title: How to watch the 2026 Super Bowl: Patriots vs. Seahawks channel, where to stream, start time, and more
item.description:
The New England Patriots are headed to the 2026 Super Bowl. (Lauren Leigh Bacho via Getty Images)
Lauren Leigh Bacho via Getty Images
The countdown is on, and Super Bowl LX, between the New England Patriots and Seattle Seahawks, is less than a week away. This year's game will be held at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, CA, and the Bay Area will be host to loads of other football events this week, too, including Thursday's NFL Honors, where we'll learn who this season's MVP is. (That event, which will be held in San Francisco, will air live on NBC and the NFL Network on Thursday at 9...

item.title: Here’s Why You Should Care About the Next-Gen Xbox Launch
item.description: It's going to make a bad time for the gaming industry even worse if Xbox can't pull off a win.

item.title: iPad deal: Get $100 off the latest iPad mini right now
item.description:
Apple's smallest tablet is a great option for frequent travelers or anywho who prefers their slabs be the size of an ereader. The latest iPad mini with the A17 Pro chip is down to one of the best prices we've seen right now — $400, which is $100 off. Apple released this iPad mini in late 2024 and it was a solid update. We gave it an 83 in our review thanks to the power of its A17 Pro chip and that it comes with a minimum of 128GB of storage. The model currently on sale comes with 128GB, Wi-Fi and all four color options: Blue, Purple, Space Gray and Starlight.
We named the Apple iPad mini o...

item.description: “Too many GPUs makes you lazy,” says the French startup's vice president of science operations, as the company carves out a different path than the major US AI companies.

item.description: Every year, CES showcases the limitless potential of our industry, but this year, we moved away from proof-of-concepts and towards real-world applications.

item.description: La OnePlus Pad Lite est une tablette abordable dont le prix chute de 30 % sur le site officiel. Une aubaine pour celles et ceux à la recherche d'une tablette efficace et pas chère.

item.title: Linux users report Microsoft's Visual Studio Code Snap package isn't actually deleting files
item.description: Many users have run out of disk space entirely, and a patch is nowhere in sight.

item.title: 'Valve is on track to begin shipping its AMD-powered Steam Machine early this year': AMD's CEO says gaming PC remains on course — and I'm hopeful it could arrive in March
item.description: Valve has previously said the Steam Machine will debut early in 2026, and Lisa Su has underlined that this is still the case.

item.title: « On prend ma voix pour faire dire n’importe quoi » : la voix française d’Harrison Ford déclare la guerre à l’IA
item.description: Voix cultes du paysage francophone, Françoise Cadol ou encore Richard Darbois ont annoncé s’attaquer aux plateformes VoiceDub et Fish Audio afin que leurs voix exploitées illégalement soient retirées.

item.title: Super Bowl 2026 TV deals: The best sales this week on OLEDs and other smart TVs ahead of the big game
item.description: Whether you’re having people over to watch the Patriots and the Seahawks battle it out in Super Bowl 2026, or you’re more interested in the Bad Bunny halftime show, your TV will be an important part of the puzzle of putting together an excellent big-game party. If you’ve been thinking about upgrading your current TV, now’s a decent time to do it. The weeks leading up to the Super Bowl are typically awash with TV deals to consider. Generally, TV prices steadily decrease after a new model comes out. Some 2026 TV models were announced at CES and are forthcoming things year, making now a good time...

item.title: VLC : après des années d’attente, cette fonctionnalité indispensable débarque enfin sur Windows
item.description: Il aura fallu attendre, mais cette fois, ça y est. VLC se met à jour et intègre enfin une option présente depuis très longtemps dans beaucoup de programmes similaires.

item.title: iOS 26.3 : Apple teste une option pour limiter la localisation des opérateurs
item.description: Avec la bêta de sa mise à jour iOS 26.3, Apple introduit une nouvelle option de confidentialité destinée à limiter la précision des données de localisation transmises aux opérateurs mobiles. Une nouvelle fonctionnalité réservée à certains appareils et réseaux.

item.title: De 1000 Go à 15 Go : la chute brutale du stockage gratuit chez Yahoo Mail
item.description: Yahoo Mail, réputé pour sa générosité en matière de stockage, a décidé de drastiquement réduire l'espace offert gratuitement à ses membres. Une décision radicale qui réduit la fracture avec la concurrence, mais qui risque surtout de bloquer de nombreuses boîtes de réception.

item.title: I wanted to see if this old, affordable Shark vacuum could hold its own against the fanciest new models – I was amazed by the results
item.description: The Shark Stratos IZ400 is often overlooked, but it's one of the best-value cordless vacs you can buy.

item.title: I drove three Chinese cars — here’s why they would clean up in the US
item.description: It only took a brief drive in a Zeekr 7X to convince me: Chinese cars are now competitive and could be sold in the US tomorrow. The compact battery-electric crossover, a bestseller in Europe, is aimed directly at the Tesla Model Y with its five seats, two rows, impressive road grip, energetic performance, and smooth […]

item.title: IKEA lance une enceinte souris à moins de 15 € qui va faire craquer les parents
item.description: Le géant suédois continue son offensive sur la tech à petit prix avec un objet qui risque de finir dans bon nombre de paniers, même sans avoir prévu de l'acheter. Découvrez la Grejsimojs, une enceinte Bluetooth au look de rongeur violet pensée pour résister aux enfants (et à leur playlist).

item.title: 'It's very ambitious and also very challenging' — Sea of Remnants developer on building the ultimate open-world pirate playground
item.description: We discuss the impressive scale and ambition of upcoming open-world pirate RPG Sea of Remnants with the game’s creative director.

item.title: Pick up the Apple Watch Series 11 while it's $100 off
item.description: If you need a little help with your New Year's resolution to be more active, you can save on the latest Apple Watch right now. The Apple Watch Series 11 is on sale for $299, which is $100 off and the lowest price we've seen. We named the Apple Watch Series 11 as our choice for best smartwatch overall. It scored a 90 in our review thanks to its 24 hours-plus of battery life and a thin, light design that's easy to wear. It also offers new health metrics, including Apple's hypertension alerts system and Sleep Score. The Apple Watch Series 11 deal is available on the 42mm case with a small/mediu...

item.title: Apple's iPhone Air MagSafe battery is cheaper than ever
item.description:
Despite its supremely sleek design, the iPhone Air actually has a pretty respectable battery life, lasting for somewhere in the region of 27 hours if you’re continuously streaming video. But you’re still going to be wary of it dying on you if you’re on a trip or just having a particularly screen-heavy day. That’s where Apple’s iPhone Air MagSafe battery pack comes in, and it’s currently on sale for $79.
This accessory only works with the iPhone Air, but much like the phone it attaches to, it’s extremely slim at 7.5mmm, so crucially doesn’t add so much bulk when attached that it defeats the p...

item.title: Le HDD n’est pas mort : l’arme secrète de Western Digital pour multiplier par 8 la vitesse de vos disques durs
item.description: Western Digital n'en a pas terminé avec les disques durs HDD. Le fabricant dévoile deux technologies pour les remettre sur le devant de la scène.

item.title: Watched the Fallout season 2 finale? Here are 3 more dystopian Prime Video shows to stream next
item.description: Fallout might be over for now, but there's lots of other great dystopian TV to watch on Prime Video.

item.title: « Claude restera sans publicité » : Anthropic se moque des pubs dans ChatGPT
item.description: Anthropic lance une offensive publicitaire pour faire connaitre son chatbot Claude. Et pour faire passer son message, quoi de mieux que de se moquer de la concurrence : la start-up a en effet décidé de s'amuser aux dépens d'OpenAI qui a annoncé l'arrivée prochaine de la publicité dans ChatGPT.

item.title: Spotify launches offline lyrics, translations, and lyric previews
item.description: On Wednesday, Spotify announced a few new lyrics features aiming to make it easier to understand and access song lyrics, including translations, previews, and offline lyrics. Lyric translations were originally introduced in 2022, but have only been available in specific markets so far. Now, they're rolling out worldwide to both free and premium Spotify users, […]...

item.title: Apple’s Vision Pro Could Not Provide Me the (Fake) Arcade of My Dreams
item.description: Apple Arcade app Retrocade won't replace the basement arcade-shaped hole in your heart.

item.title: Apple AirTag (2026) review: Simply better
item.description: It’s hard to tell the difference between Apple’s second-generation AirTag and the almost-five-year-old original just by looking at them. In fact, the only way to tell is the many scratches on my old tracker, picked up from all those years attached to my keyring, living in my pocket. While the price is still $29, Apple’s latest tracker packs some core upgrades. The new AirTag has a second-generation ultra-wideband (UWB) chip that extends its Precise Finding range up to 50 percent, though it requires an iPhone 15 or newer to do so. It’s also apparently 50 percent louder and has a new, higher-pi...

item.title: « Aucune démocratie n’oserait faire ça » : pourquoi les politiques français se trompent en ciblant les VPN
item.description: Les VPN sont-ils encore bienvenus en France ? Les dernières offensives contre les fournisseurs présagent un avenir sombre pour la protection de la vie privée en ligne. Une stratégie irréfléchie, inutile, voire dangereuse, mais ô combien plus facile que de prendre à bras-le-corps tous ces problèmes dont sont accusés les VPN.

item.title: Get a complete home office PC for under $500 with this Lenovo 24-inch All-in-One — save $300 on a space-saving desktop
item.description: The Lenovo 24-inch all-in-one desktop comes with 16GB of DDR4 RAM, fast SSD storage, and a clean, space-saving design, for under $500.

item.title: Nioh 3 : voici les configurations sur PC, à quoi s’attendre ?
item.description: Le troisième opus de la série de jeux Nioh sort très -très - bientôt. Quelles sont les configurations attendues pour pouvoir en profiter sur PC ?

item.title: Nintendo's first Direct showcase of 2026 is scheduled for February 5
item.description: Nintendo has lined up its first showcase of the year. The next Nintendo Direct is taking place on February 5 at 9AM ET, the company has announced. It will run for around 30 minutes.As previous reports suggested, it will focus on third-party titles from partners instead of first-party games from Nintendo itself. So if you were hoping for new Mario or Zelda announcements, that may not happen during this event. Still, you can expect to hear about new games that are coming to Switch and Switch 2. You can tune into the Direct via the YouTube video embedded above. FromSoftware’s The Duskbloods, a Ni...

item.title: Uber appoints new CFO as its AV plans accelerate
item.description: Uber is promoting Balaji Krishnamurthy, its VP of strategic finance and investor relations, to be its CFO, replacing its current finance chief Prashanth Mahendra-Rajah.

item.title: Fraude à la carte grise : des hackers ont créé des milliers de faux certificats d’immatriculation
item.description: En France, un trou béant dans le système des cartes grises est à l'origine d'une fraude massive à l'immatriculation. Des cybercriminels profitent de la situation pour détourner les comptes de garages habilités, générer des milliers de fausses cartes grises… en laissant derrière eux des professionnels ruinés par les taxes réclamées par le gouvernement....

item.title: Coinbase reveals insider breach did take place, customer info compromised
item.description: Info on roughly 30 people was exposed in a new insider incident at Coinbase.

item.title: Chipotle has a 4-part plan to boost flat sales. Part 1 is ‘the most celebrated limited-time offer in history’
item.description: In an earnings call on Tuesday, CEO Scott Boatwright said the Mexican restaurant chain will increase its ‘menu innovation cadence’ in 2026. Shares of Chipotle Mexican Grill are down over 6% in premarket trading following a relatively humdrum fourth-quarter earnings report.

item.title: Your skincare products are full of fats and oils. This startup launched a clean beauty line with ancient chemistry
item.description: Savor turns captured carbon dioxide into fats. After first making butter, the company is now entering the personal care and beauty space. Your beauty and skincare products are full of fats and oils. They’re what makes that cream so moisturizing or that emollient so good at repairing your skin barrier.

item.title: Amazon rolls out Alexa Plus nationwide and launches a new free tier
item.description: Amazon has announced that its generative AI-powered digital assistant Alexa Plus is now available to all Prime members in the US via any Alexa-enabled device, Alexa.com, and the Alexa mobile app. If you don't have Prime, you can access the assistant on a new free tier on the web and app, or pay $20 a […]

item.title: Alexa+, Amazon’s AI assistant, is now available to everyone in the U.S.
item.description: Amazon opens Alexa+ to everyone in the U.S. The AI feature is free for Prime members across devices, and free for everyone on mobile and web.

item.title: Apeiron Labs gets $9.5M to flood the oceans with autonomous underwater robots
item.description: Most of what we know about the ocean just skims the surface, literally. We’ve gathered a large quantity of data on the oceans from satellites, but most of that is based on the top layer of water. Below that, the picture gets murkier. Buoys, ships, and some autonomous rovers have recently added some detail, but […]

item.title: Nioh 3 taking the series to an open-world format works shockingly well — thanks to that and its style-switching combat, it’s become one of the best soulslikes I’ve ever played
item.description: Nioh 3’s changes to the series’ established formula make for a fresh yet familiar feeling game, and I can’t get enough of it.

item.title: Ce nouveau smartphone Oppo à l’autonomie XXL vient de sortir et perd déjà 70 € de son prix
item.description: Oppo dégaine déjà de nouveaux smartphones milieu de gamme, et le Reno 15 FS mise sur une grosse batterie de 6 500 mAh pour convaincre. Mieux encore, ce dernier se trouve déjà en promo : 379 euros contre 449 euros de base.

item.title: Call of Duty : Activision s’attaque enfin aux tricheurs de la pire espèce
item.description: Activision renforce son système de détection de triche pour les utilisateurs de dispositifs tiers comme le Cronus Zen ou XIM, le dernier rempart contre les pires tricheurs de Call of Duty.

item.title: This 45W Anker Nano charger with smart display is on sale for only $30
item.description: Anker introduced a nifty little charger at CES 2026, which is a refresh of the pre-existing Nano Charger. It's already on sale for $30 on Amazon, which is a 25 percent discount. The 45W charger includes a smart display that shows real-time data like power flow, temperature and charging status. It also features "fun animations to keep things cheerful." Anker says it can recognize what's being charged and automatically adjust certain metrics to ensure a longer battery lifespan. To that end, it works with just about everything. The company advertises that this charger is a good fit for the iPhon...

item.title: Coros transforme ses montres de sport : voici toutes les nouveautés de la mise à jour de février
item.description: Coros a annoncé une mise à jour majeure de ses montres de sport et de son compteur GPS avec de nombreuses nouveautés.

item.title: Microsoft’s latest chip points to a future where laptops and phones aren’t held hostage by AI inflation
item.description: Microsoft's new AI chip shows how consumer computing devices like laptops and phones might eventually escape the AI bubble and spiraling prices.
